title: Holiday experiences = Ferienerlebnisse
creator_credit: Otto Sacher, D E F A Studio and Progress Film
brief_description: In German language. A boy and girl’s adventures in the snow. In a comical train, they travel to a high mountain and the boy skis down it collecting a toboggan en route, sailing along the train’s tracks and finally bumping into the train which concertinas. The girl helps pull the train into shape again and they get in and go home.
